translations: （尤指饲养牛、马、羊等的）大农场，大牧场；<美>牧场式住宅（=ranch house）；<美>酸奶油沙拉酱（=ranch dressing）
经营牧场（或农场）；在农场饲养（牲畜）；把（土地）用作牧场（或农场）

phrs.translation: 度假牧场；观光牧场或农场

sentences.sentence: I have set the wheels in motion to sell their Arizona ranch.
sentences.translation: 我已着手出售他们在亚利桑那州的大农场。

sentences.sentence: They had to buy everything at inflated prices at the ranch shop.
sentences.translation: 他们不得不以高价购买牧场商店里的各种物品。

sentences.sentence: In his twenties Roosevelt had sought work as a cowboy on a ranch in the Dakota Territory.
sentences.translation: 二十多岁时，罗斯福曾经到达科他地区的一个大牧场去找牧牛工的活儿。
